com.datasift.dropwizard.zookeeper
Class ZooKeeperFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.datasift.dropwizard.zookeeper.ZooKeeperFactory

public class ZooKeeperFactory
extends Object

A Factory for creating configured and managed ZooKeeper client instances.

A ZooKeeperHealthCheck will be registered for each ZooKeeper client isntance that checks for the existence of the configured namespace.

See Also:
ZooKeeperConfiguration, ZooKeeperHealthCheck, ManagedZooKeeper

Constructor Detail

ZooKeeperFactory

public ZooKeeperFactory(Environment environment)
Creates a new ZooKeeperFactory instance for the specified Environment.

Parameters:
environment - the environment to build ZooKeeper instances for.
Method Detail

build

public ZooKeeper build(ZooKeeperConfiguration configuration)
                throws IOException
Builds a default ZooKeeper instance from the given ZooKeeperConfiguration.

No Watcher will be configured for the built ZooKeeper instance. If you wish to watch all events on the ZooKeeper client, use build(ZooKeeperConfiguration, Watcher).

Parameters:
configuration - the configuration to configure the ZooKeeper instance with.
Returns:
a ZooKeeper client, managed and configured according to the configuration.
Throws:
IOException - if there is a network failure.

build

public ZooKeeper build(ZooKeeperConfiguration configuration,
                       Watcher watcher)
                throws IOException
Builds a default ZooKeeper instance from the given ZooKeeperConfiguration.

The given Watcher will be assigned to watch for all events on the ZooKeeper client instance. If you wish to ignore events, use build(ZooKeeperConfiguration).

Parameters:
configuration - the configuration to configure the ZooKeeper instance with.
watcher - the watcher to handle all events that occur on the ZooKeeper client.
Returns:
a ZooKeeper client, managed and configured according to the configuration.
Throws:
IOException - if there is a network failure.

build

public ZooKeeper build(ZooKeeperConfiguration configuration,
                       String name)
                throws IOException
Builds a named ZooKeeper instance from the given ZooKeeperConfiguration.

No Watcher will be configured for the built ZooKeeper instance. If you wish to watch all events on the ZooKeeper client, use build(ZooKeeperConfiguration, Watcher, String).

Parameters:
configuration - the configuration to configure the ZooKeeper instance with.
name - the name for this instance.
Returns:
a ZooKeeper client, managed and configured according to the configuration.
Throws:
IOException - if there is a network failure.

build

public ZooKeeper build(ZooKeeperConfiguration configuration,
                       Watcher watcher,
                       String name)
                throws IOException
Builds a named ZooKeeper instance from the given ZooKeeperConfiguration.

The given Watcher will be assigned to watch for all events on the ZooKeeper client instance. If you wish to ignore events, use build(ZooKeeperConfiguration, String).

Parameters:
configuration - the configuration to configure the ZooKeeper instance with.
watcher - the watcher to handle all events that occur on the ZooKeeper client.
name - the name for this instance.
Returns:
a ZooKeeper client, managed and configured according to the configuration.
Throws:
IOException - if there is a network failure.
